aws_s3_bucket_inventory.description: Provides a S3 bucket inventory configuration resource.

bucket.description: The S3 bucket configuration where inventory results are published (documented below).

name.description: Unique identifier of the inventory configuration for the bucket.

included_object_versions.description: Object versions to include in the inventory list. Valid values: `All`, `Current`.

schedule.description: Specifies the schedule for generating inventory results (documented below).

destination.description: Contains information about where to publish the inventory results (documented below).

enabled.description: Specifies whether the inventory is enabled or disabled.

filter.description: Specifies an inventory filter. The inventory only includes objects that meet the filter's criteria (documented below).

optional_fields.description: List of optional fields that are included in the inventory results.

prefix.description: The prefix that is prepended to all inventory results.

frequency.description: Specifies how frequently inventory results are produced. Valid values: `Daily`, `Weekly`.

bucket_arn.description: The Amazon S3 bucket ARN of the destination.

format.description: Specifies the output format of the inventory results. Can be `CSV`, [`ORC`](https://orc.apache.org/

account_id.description: The ID of the account that owns the destination bucket. Recommended to be set to prevent problems if the destination bucket ownership changes.

encryption.description: Contains the type of server-side encryption to use to encrypt the inventory (documented below).

sse_kms.description: Specifies to use server-side encryption with AWS KMS-managed keys to encrypt the inventory file (documented below).

sse_s3.description: Specifies to use server-side encryption with Amazon S3-managed keys (SSE-S3

key_id.description: The ARN of the KMS customer master key (CMK
